ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: MAJOR ACTIVITIES TO BE PURSUED BY PEOPLE CAUSE FOUNDATION, THE COMPANY (NGO), ARE :- (i) To work in the spheres of Health including organizing rural health programs; medical camps in rural areas; leprosy eradication programs; family welfare and immunization programs; construction and establishment of hospitals, Education including formulation of schemes for non formal education and literacy especially for children and women; construction of school building for children belonging especially to the economically weaker sections of the society, Protection of Natural Environment and Water Resources, Tree Plantation, Social Forestry, Striving for Clean Energy including establishment and running of non-conventional and renewable sources of energy systems, Land Development and recovering of waste land with special concern on ecological improvement, Developing Scientific Temper and promoting research, improving and educating for better quality of life. Besides this, promoting harmony and brotherhood amongst the people and undertaking matters relating to people causes for their good and welfare especially for poor; deprived and down-trodden may be the other tasks to be undertaken by the Company. Safeguarding Human Rights of the People globally and helping in natural calamities and disasters of Earthquake, Flood, Famine, Epidemic etc. shall be of priorities for the Company. (ii) To improve, development in India, by carrying on the business of providing services, to large number of poor, in their villages/ towns for their socio-economic development in sustainable manner, and to undertake community development and welfare programmers sponsored and/ or by Central & State Goverments, World Bank, multilateral agencies, donors, financial institutions and banks as their correspondent or otherwise. In fact, Company is committed to undertake duteously all those tasks not mentioned here in above but affecting public welfare and concern in general.
